MAN.TITLE: b_mix
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: mixes two coherent wave fields into one wave field.

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: :the first input field. it must be diffractive wavefront.
:the second input field. it must be diffractive wavefront.
: the output field or diffractive wavefront.

DESCRIPTION.P: The input fields must be the same as dimensions, sizes, wavelengths and the coordinate systems.If not the same dimensions, you can use comammd interpol resize the field, then mix the two coherent fields.
